name: Cloudcorner.net vWorld
tagline: vmware and other virtualization engine related scripts
body:
Welcome to this Git-hub project pages !

You will found here a small repository with some of my VMware or other virtualization engine related scripts, more will come.

## About Me

I am Datacenter IT architect specialize in Storage/Backup/Virtualization and much more !
If you want to know more about me just check my [linkedin profile](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/shah-mohsin-wahed/1a/750/18a) page.

## snapconsolidate.ps1

This script will consolidate snapshot on your vCenter Server

### Requirements / Pre-requisites

This script will require the following components:

    1. Windows PowerShell 2.0+
    2. VMware vSphereâ„¢ PowerCLI


### usage

Simply launch the script from the PowerCLI prompt or schedule it from windows

`PowerCLI DRIVE:\PathToScript> snapconsolidate.ps1`

## Authors and Contributors

Author: Shah Mohsin WAHED | [linkedin profile](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/shah-mohsin-wahed/1a/750/18a)


## Support or Contact

Having trouble with the scripts within this repository ?
Contact me.
